quoteAuthor: Melvin Udall (from As Good As It Gets)

quoteText: Every love story is beautiful, but ours is my favorite.
When I follow my heart, it leads me to you.
I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once.
Because of you, I laugh a little harder, cry a little less, and smile a lot more.
There is no charm equal to tenderness of heart.
I wish I could turn back the clock. I‚Äôd find you sooner and love you longer.
My love for you is past the mind, beyond my heart, and into my soul.
To be your friend was all I ever wanted; to be your lover was all I ever dreamed.
You‚Äôre the closest to heaven, that I‚Äôll ever be.
If I had a flower for every time I thought of you... I could walk through my garden forever.
Love is not about how many
